EmailTemplate.name: 2021 Dealer Update #8.2021 Dealer Update #8
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletins - May 2021
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Sales Bulletins | May 2021 New Sales Bulletins Honeywell is pleased to announce the following bulletins:
- 2021-09 Rev B <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2021-09-Rev-B-Multipurpose-Control-and-Display-Unit-Replacement-for-Business-Aircraft.pdf]]> Multipurpose Control and Display Unit Replacement for Business Aircraft - 2021-19 Rev C <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2021-19-Rev-C---DU-875-LCD-Display-Unit-Upgrades-for-All-Platforms.pdf]]> DU-875 LCD Display Unit Upgrades for All Platforms - 2021-52 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2021-52-RDR7000-Trade-In-Promotion-for-Commercial-Helicopters.pdf]]> 2021-52 RDR7000 Trade-In Promotion for Commercial Helicopters - OIB 2021-36 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/OIB 2021-36 MCS-7100 %28HD-710%29 Series Satcom System for Business Aircraft.pdf]]>MCS-7100 (HD-710) Series Satcom System for Business Aircraft - OIB 2021-51 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/OIB 2021-51 AMT-50 to AMT-700 Trade-In Program.pdf]]>AMT-50 to AMT-700 Trade-In Program
Dealers can find these bulletins on our website <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace]]> under Purchase/Orders/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
